========================
Data File Profiler Utils
========================

A Python module for simple data file profiling.


Usage
--------


from import data_file_profiler_utils import Manager as ProfileManager

pm = ProfileManager()
pm.profile_file("/tmp/patient002.vcf")



Credits
-------
